## Description {#details}

\\A DAG update listener to keep the matching state (i.e.

RecordedNodes and <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-selectiondagisel-cpp-/matchscope">MatchScope</a>) uptodate if the target is allowed to change the DAG while matching. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> addressing mode matcher is an example for this.

Definition at line 3190 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/selectiondagisel-cpp">SelectionDAGISel.cpp</a>.
